metadata.title: Create Resume Header & Main Content Components

story.iWant: to see my name, title, summary, and work experience prominently
story.soThat: recruiters see the most important information first
story.tasks: - Create ResumeHeader component - Create ResumeSummary component - Create ResumeExperience component - Integrate components into ResumePreview - Test components rendering

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Header shows full name in large bold text (2rem, font-bold)
Job title appears below name (1.25rem, text-gray-600)
Blue accent line or background element is present
Experience shows for each job: position title (bold), company name, date range (formatted: "Jan 2022 - Present"), bullet points for highlights (• character)
Jobs are sorted by date (most recent first)
"Present" is shown for current jobs (no endDate)

doc.title: Resume Export Feature - Architecture Document
doc.snippet: WorkExperience interface: company, position, startDate (YYYY-MM), endDate (optional), highlights (string[])

doc.title: Epic Technical Specification: Resume Preview Page
doc.section: AC5: Header Section, AC10: Summary Section, AC11: Experience Section
doc.snippet: Header: Name in 2rem bold, job title 1.25rem gray, blue accent line. Summary: Section header, paragraph with line-height 1.6. Experience: Position, company, date range, bullet highlights.

artifact.reason: Parent container where these components will be integrated
Provides data and date formatting helper

story-context.constraints: - Header: text-3xl font-bold for name, text-xl text-gray-600 for title - Blue accent: border-b-4 border-blue-600 - Summary: text-base font-semibold for header, leading-relaxed (1.6) for paragraph - Experience: Sort by startDate descending, format dates with formatDate() helper - Bullet character: • (U+2022) - File locations: app/components/resume/ResumeHeader.vue, ResumeSummary.vue, ResumeExperience.vue - Props pattern: Accept specific data fields, not entire resume object

interface.name: ResumeHeader Props
interface.signature: interface Props { name: string; label: string }

tests.standards: Vue component testing with Vitest. Test props, rendering, and date formatting.
